text: On the 2nd of January 2024, Saleh al-Arouri, was killed by an Israeli missile attack in the neighborhood of Dahieh in Beirut. The missile attack killed 6 civilians which also included other members of the Hamas political party. == References == (as)</div Category:Hamas Category:Extrajudicial killings by the Israeli military
title: Assassination of Saleh al-Arouri
